original_title: Jeanine Pirro's office ends D.C. rifle and shotgun felony prosecutions policy | Fox News
article_summary: U.S. Attorney for D.C., Jeanine Pirro, announces a new policy that will no longer prosecute individuals for possessing rifles or shotguns in Washington, D.C., except in limited cases. The change is based on guidance from the Justice Department and complies with two Supreme Court rulings protecting gun rights. Pirro also expresses concern about youth crime in D.C. and calls for reforms to bolster public safety.</s>
